name: OCI registry pull-through cache to mirror rate-limited upstream registries, such as Docker Hub
description: Deploys a devcontainer-local CNCF Distribution Registry configured as a pull-through cache for the local docker-in-docker

proxy-remote-url.description: URL of the upstream OCI registry

port.description: port to bind the CNCF Distribution Registry service to

registry-name.description: the Docker container name to give the CNCF Distribution Registry

wait.description: maximum wait time in seconds for Docker to become available when starting the CNCF Distribution Registry service
